mapper.select: select a.id,a.menuname,a.url,a.priority,case when a.ismenu = 1 then '是' else '否' end ismenu,a.pid,b.menuname pmenuname from t_sys_menu a left join t_sys_menu b on a.pid=b.id where a.isdisabled=0 order by a.priority
select id,menuname from t_sys_menu where ismenu =1 and isdisabled=0 order by priority
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_menu(menuname, url, ismenu, pid, createdate, remark, priority, status, isdisabled, operuser, operdate) values(#{menuname}, #{url}, #{ismenu}, #{pid}, #{createdate}, #{remark}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{isdisabled}, #{operuser}, #{operdate})
